about_the_game:
The dread wizardess Galgatax has awoken yet again and it's up to you to find the Chosen Sisters and travel to the Hellfire Peak to defeat the monster that has been summoned.

If you've read this far, you should probably just download the game. It's free, you know. Especially if you are a fan of, say, Final Fantasy, Chrono Trigger or Dragon Quest. Just saying.

  • More locations you can count (with the fingers of one hand after a disfiguring accident)
  • Deep engaging combat mechanics (for a three-year-old)
  • Immersive and epic storyline and colourful characters (literally, they're not black & white)
  • Just added this bullet point to make the list longer. It's not like anyone reads these, right?

highlighted.name: Defeats are a girl's best friend

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains adult themes and content that may not be suitable for all ages. These themes include strong language, fantasy violence, alcohol and minor innuendo.
